ThingDef.label: parrot egg (unfert.)
ThingDef.description: An unfertilized parrot egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: parrot egg (fert.)
ThingDef.description: A fertilized parrot egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a parrot. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: giant chinese salamander egg (unfert.)
ThingDef.description: An unfertilized giant chinese salamander egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: giant chinese salamander egg (fert.)
ThingDef.description: A fertilized giant chinese salamander egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a giant chinese salamander. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: gecko egg (unfert.)
ThingDef.description: An unfertilized leopard gecko egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked.

ThingDef.label: gecko egg (fert.)
ThingDef.description: A fertilized gecko egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a gecko. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.
